text: Frank James Malzone (February 28, 1930 - December 29, 2015) was an American baseball player. He was a former Major League Baseball third baseman and right-handed slugger who played for the Boston Red Sox (1955â€“65) and California Angels (1966). He was born in The Bronx, New York. Malzone died in Needham, Massachusetts of natural causes at the age of 85.Six-time Red Sox All-Star Frank Malzone dies at age 85 ==References== ==Other websites== *Baseball Library * Category:1930 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American baseball players Category:Boston Red Sox players Category:California Angels players Category:Sportspeople from the Bronx
title: Frank Malzone
